name: Canto
desc: Can move again after certain actions.

name: Canto+
desc: Can move again after certain actions.

name: Rescue
desc: Unit is weighed down with a traveler.

name: Steal
desc: Can steal items from enemies with lower speed.

name: Locktouch
desc: Unit can opened locks without a key.

name: Void Curse
desc: No exp gained for attacking this unit.

name: Reflect
desc: Negative statuses are reflected back at the attacker.

name: Underdog
desc: Grants Damage +2 and Damage Taken -2 against enemies with greater max HP.

name: Swordbreaker
desc: Grants Hit/Avoid +30 against enemies wielding Swords.
components: 30 if target.get_weapon() and item_system.weapon_type(target, target.get_weapon()) == 'Sword' else 0
30 if target.get_weapon() and item_system.weapon_type(target, target.get_weapon()) == 'Sword' else 0

name: Lancebreaker
desc: Grants Hit/Avoid +30 against enemies wielding Lances.
components: 30 if target.get_weapon() and item_system.weapon_type(target, target.get_weapon()) == 'Lance' else 0
30 if target.get_weapon() and item_system.weapon_type(target, target.get_weapon()) == 'Lance' else 0

name: Axebreaker
desc: Grants Hit/Avoid +30 against enemies wielding Axes.
components: 30 if target.get_weapon() and item_system.weapon_type(target, target.get_weapon()) == 'Axe' else 0
30 if target.get_weapon() and item_system.weapon_type(target, target.get_weapon()) == 'Axe' else 0

name: Canto+
desc: Can move again after taking an action.

name: Resist Status
desc: Ignore temporary status ailments after 1 turn.

name: Evasion
desc: Area of Effect attacks always miss this unit.

name: Prescience
desc: If attacking, grants Hit/Avoid +15 and Damage +1.

name: Patience
desc: If attacked, grants Hit/Avoid +15 and Damage +1.

name: Overwhelm
desc: If attacking and damage would defeat enemy, grants Hit +30.
components: 30 if (mode in ('attack', 'splash') and combat_calcs.compute_damage(unit, target, item, target.get_weapon(), 'attack') >= target.get_hp()) else 0

name: Rex Aegis
desc: Grants Avoid +500 and Defense +100 vs. enemies more than two tiles away.

name: Heavy Hitter
desc: Adds half weapon weight to damage.

name: Charge
desc: Adds (distance moved - 2) this turn to damage.
components: max(0, utils.calculate_distance(unit.position, unit.previous_position) - 2) if unit.position and mode in ('attack', 'splash') else 0

name: Focus
desc: Grants Hit/Avoid +20 if no allies are within 3 tiles.

name: Synergy
desc: Grants Hit/Avoid +10 if an ally is within 3 tiles.

name: Futuresight
desc: Grants Hit/Avoid +30 if HP is under half.

name: Purity
desc: Unit is not affected by negative statuses.

name: Conductance
desc: Grants Hit +15 and Damage +1 against enemies wielding metal weapons.
components: 1 if target.get_weapon() and item_system.weapon_type(target, target.get_weapon()) in ('Sword', 'Lance', 'Axe') else 0
15 if target.get_weapon() and item_system.weapon_type(target, target.get_weapon()) in ('Sword', 'Lance', 'Axe') else 0

name: Miracle
desc: Once per chapter, if this unit would die, instead they survive with 1 HP.

name: Healtouch
desc: Heal +5 HP when healing an ally.
components: 5 if target and unit is not target and skill_system.check_ally(unit, target) else 0

name: Vantage
desc: If 4 more attack speed than enemy, double counterattack while defending.

name: Critical
components: item_system.is_weapon(unit, item) and not item_funcs.is_magic(unit, item)

name: Cleave
desc: Combat Art. Prereq: Axe. Damages all adjacent enemy units.
components: item_system.weapon_type(unit, item) in ('Sword', 'Axe') and 1 in item_funcs.get_range(unit, item)

name: Metamagic
desc: Automatic Art. When charged, next attack has increased area of blast +1.

name: Overcharged
desc: Next attack or spell has increased area of effect.

name: Shove
desc: Activated. Push a unit one square away.

name: Rally
desc: Activated. Grant all allies within a 3 tile radius +4 to all stats for one turn.

name: Luna
desc: Combat Art. Ignore enemy's Defense or Resistance.

name: Sol
desc: Combat Art. Recover HP equal to damage dealt to enemy.

name: Longshot
desc: While wielding a bow, attack range +1.

name: Slow
desc: Slow enemies struck by your weapons.

name: TLT_Inspiration
desc: Aura. Grants allies Damage +1 and Damage Taken -1.

name: Provoke
desc: After battle, inflicts Hit -30 and Damage -2 when attacking other units.

name: Provoked
desc: Hit -30 and Damage -2 when attacking units other than the one provoking it.

name: Void Curse
desc: Enemies earn no EXP from this unit.

name: Adept
desc: Saga of Spirits: Gain an additional attack when the battle begins, but cannot double.

name: Pressure Performer
desc: Saga of Spirits: Gain +3 Skl and Spd when below 50% health.

name: Vantage
desc: Saga of Spirits: If this unit can double an attacking enemy, this unit will attack first.

name: Rally Infantry
desc: Saga of Spirits: Infantry allies within two spaces gain +4 to all non-movement stats.

name: Fervor
desc: Saga of Spirits: For every 4 health lost, gain 1 additional damage.

name: Focus Strike
desc: SoS: The might of the unit's weapon doubles. Cannot double, and -4 STR for one turn.

name: Unyielding Will
desc: Saga of Spirits: +2 damage and +2 DEF/RES if the target is at full HP.

name: Marauder
desc: SoS: Grants the ability to move through high peaks and sea, along with easier movement through mountains.

name: Block
desc: SoS: Add weapon MT to DEF. Cannot counterattack for the remainder of your turn.

name: Cannot Counter
desc: Cannot counterattack until their next turn

name: Deliverer
desc: SoS: Gain +2 movement when carrying a unit.

name: Snipe
desc: SoS: Gain +35 hit if the unit has not moved.

name: Shade
desc: For one turn, nearby units suffer massive penalties when attacking this unit.

name: Shaded
desc: Hit -100 when attacking the shaded unit.

name: Overkill
desc: SoS: If a unit's hit were to exceed the 100, all extra hit is converted to crit.

name: Exploit
desc: SoS: Gain +3 damage if this unit attacks an enemy who cannot counterattack.
components: 3 if not combat_calcs.can_counterattack(unit, unit.get_weapon(), target, target.get_weapon()) else 0

name: Provoke
desc: SoS: Nearby enemies are forced to attack this unit for one enemy phase.

name: Provoked
desc: Hit -100 when not attacking the provoking unit.

name: Divine Intervention
desc: SoS: Add your Luck to your critical chance for your next attack, and this turn area of effect attacks can critical.

name: Blessing
desc: SoS: Restore 5 health to all non-enemies in 2 spaces every turn

name: Blessed
desc: Regenerates 5 HP at the start of each turn

name: Dark Drain
desc: SoS: Heal 50% of the HP lost by the enemy in the battle.

name: Opportunist
desc: SoS: Gain +5 damage if this unit attacks an enemy who cannot counterattack.
components: 5 if not combat_calcs.can_counterattack(unit, unit.get_weapon(), target, target.get_weapon()) else 0

name: Willpower
desc: SoS: If this unit's HP is at 100%, gain +3 DEF and RES.
